   <script src="http://www.google.com/jsapi?key=ABQIAAAAQWv73gqYPWRTaE716jUMxxQ2bOFDx81TECx9eufqRKtRaBsQ9BTauYaQXS4Q90RWQbUjrd2PDKEHNw" type="text/javascript">

   <script type="text/javascript">
    google.load("earth", "1");
 google.load("maps", "2.99");  // For JS geocoder
 
 var ge = null;
 var geocoder;
 
 
 function init() {
   geocoder = new GClientGeocoder();
   google.earth.createInstance("map3d", initCB, failureCB);
 }
 
 function initCB(object) {
   ge = object;
   ge.getWindow().setVisibility(true);
 }
 
 function failureCB(object) {
   alert('load failed');
 }
 
 function submitLocation() {
   var address = document.getElementById('address').value;
   geocoder.getLatLng(
     address, 
     function(point) {
       if (point && ge != null) {
         var la = ge.createLookAt('');     
         la.set(point.y, point.x, 100, ge.ALTITUDE_RELATIVE_TO_GROUND, 
                0, 0, 4000);
         ge.getView().setAbstractView(la);
       }
     }
   );
 }
   </script>

    <h2 align="left">
     LESAR
    </h2>
    <table border="0" cellpadding="5">
     <tr>
      <td height="356">
       <table border="0" width="100%">
        <tr>
         <td width="73%">
          <img align="left" alt="" height="190" hspace="10" src="http://www.lesar.org/images/pic1.jpg" width="125"/>
          <p>
           Little Egypt  Search and Rescue (LESAR) is an independent volunteer search and rescue team  based in Southern Illinois. We are dedicated to the search for and rescue of  lost and/or injured persons.
          </p>
          <p>
           LESAR responds to  any law enforcement or officially designated incident command agenciesâ€™  requests for our services. We are on call 24/7/365. We do not self deploy, nor  do we solicit our skills to individuals.
          </p>
          <p>
           All inquiries for  more information are welcome. If you are from our local region and are  interested in joining LESAR please contact us by phone or email on our
           <a href="contact.htm">
            Contact Us
           </a>
           page.
          </p>
         </td>
        </tr>
       </table>
      </td>
     </tr>
    </table>
    <h2>
     Our Organization
    </h2>
    <img align="left" height="137" hspace="10" src="images/lesar_logo.jpg" width="137"/>
    <p>
     LESAR is a Non-Profit organization of unpaid professionals dedicated to serving those in their time of need. We ensure that our team members, as well as serving agencies and community citizens are treated with the utmost respect and courtesy.
    </p>
    <p>
     It is the duty of every operational member of LESAR to help maintain our team, our equipment, and ourselves in a state of readiness so we may respond quickly and efficiently when needed.
    </p>
    <p>
    </p>
    <p>
     <br/>
    </p>
    <h2>
     Our Services
    </h2>
    <p>
     Little Egypt Search And Rescue is on call 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year. LESAR will deploy in all kinds of weather in the event of an emergency or lost/missing person.
    </p>

     To activate the team
